books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The host of "The O'Reilly Factor" recounts the events leading up to Jesus' execution.
books.name: KILLING JESUS

books.author: by Charles Krauthammer
books.description: Three decades’ worth of essays from the conservative columnist.
books.name: THINGS THAT MATTER

books.author: by Malcolm Gladwell
books.description: How disadvantages can work in our favor; from the author of "The Tipping Point" and "Outliers."
books.name: DAVID AND GOLIATH

books.author: by Pat Conroy
books.description: In this memoir, Conroy mourns the abusive father on whom “The Great Santini” was based.
books.name: THE DEATH OF SANTINI

books.author: by Malala Yousafzai with Christina Lamb
books.description: The experience of the Pakistani girl who advocated for women’s education and was shot by the Taliban.
books.name: I AM MALALA

books.author: by Henry Bushkin
books.description: A recollection by Carson’s lawyer and confidant for 18 years.
books.name: JOHNNY CARSON

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: An appreciation of the dogs in Steel's life.
books.name: PURE JOY

books.author: by Artie Lange with Anthony Bozza
books.description: The comedian describes his experience with depression, addiction and recovery.
books.name: CRASH AND BURN

books.author: by Solomon Northup
books.description: The narrative, first published in 1853, of a freeman who was kidnapped and sold into slavery, and spent 12 years in bondage before escaping. The book is the basis of the recently released movie.
books.name: TWELVE YEARS A SLAVE

books.author: by Eben Alexander
books.description: A neurosurgeon recounts his near death experience during a coma from bacterial meningitis.
books.name: PROOF OF HEAVEN

books.author: by Elizabeth Smart with Chris Stewart
books.description: A woman kidnapped from her Utah home in 2002 at age 14 describes her captivity and rescue.
books.name: MY STORY

books.author: by Piper Kerman
books.description: A memoir by a Brooklyn woman whose relationship with a drug runner gets her sentenced to a year in prison. The basis for the Netflix series, originally published in 2010.
books.name: ORANGE IS THE NEW BLACK

books.author: by Naoki Higashida
books.description: A 13-year-old boy with autism answers questions.
books.name: THE REASON I JUMP

books.author: by Howard G. Buffett and Howard W. Buffett
books.description: What Warren Buffett’s son and grandson have learned in their efforts to feed the hungry.
books.name: 40 CHANCES

books.author: by Philip Shenon
books.description: A journalist argues that the F.B.I., C.I.A. and others withheld information about Kennedy’s assassination from the Warren Commission.
books.name: A CRUEL AND SHOCKING ACT
